description.brief: Package that uses the pkg-config file generated by deps_target to check its validity

package.description: This package is part of a set of three that tests base/cmake DEPS_TARGET functionality. the deps_target package uses a CMake target exported by deps_target_dependency. This package (deps_target_use_pkgconfig) then tries to use the result as a pkg-config dependency.
package.author: Sylvain Joyeux/sylvain.joyeux@tidewise.io
